General.Name: Nano Dimension Ltd
General.Description: Nano Dimension Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs and manufactures systems useful in the electronic fabrication in Israel and Internationally. The company offers addictively manufactured electronics, such as dragon fly iv, an advanced 3d printing and AME materials; and SMT technology, such as versatile high-speed dispensing systems, optimized component monitoring, production SMD software, and full convection reflow ovens. It also offers DLP and SLA materials, and global inkjet system, a digital deposition technology, as well as micro-AM / fabrica. It provides Aidro, an advanced hydraulic system; Adaptive3D; DentalLabs, a dental parts services; Desktop Metal, a binder jetting for metal; DragonFly, an AME; 	EnvisionTech, an additive manufacturing DLP; Essemtec, a surface-mount technology; 	ExOne, a binder jetting for metal and sandcasting; Global Inkjet Systems, a digital printing sub-components hardware and software; Markforged " Desktop and industrial fused filament fabrication solutions; and PX100, a binder jetting for metal. It serves to industries including, aerospace, defense, automotive, electronics, medical, research and academia, as well as government organizations. Nano Dimension Ltd. is headquartered in Ness Ziona, Israel.
